cause.description:
Join this cause to help protest against holocaust denial!! It is a very important cause!!! This is a threat that is threatened every year! We must stop this!!!! Even if they just threaten to remove it, we must stop the threats!!!
1. Holocaust denial must end!
2. 60m people died!
3. Stop the government threatening to remove the holocaust from the National Curiculum!!!
cause.mission: Get the holocaust back in to the national curriculum in UK school!!
cause.name: Holocaust 4 national curriculum in UK!!
